title: Console - Web Element selector does not bring back up the console after selecting an element on web page
content: I'm new to Firefox, usually in other browser, like Chrome and Edge, when I use the selector to choose element and click on it, it will bring back the console but it doesn't seems to happen in Firefox. ( I'm using separate window for the console )
creator: zisheng0101

title: Shift+Delete No Longer Works
content: Recently I've been having trouble deleting selected urls. Holding down Shift+Delete doesn't do anything anymore unless I'm lucky and it'll delete one or two of the urls I choose but most of the time nothing happens at all! I never liked having to hold 2 buttons when pressing one worked just fine in the past but I dealt with it and I shouldn't have to open my whole history each time when doing it from a normal window should work. I don't like deleting my whole history and much rather pick and choose which ones to get rid of like let's plays with lots of parts.
creator: hylian_dragon_warrior

title: The image background on a theme I made in Firefox Colour isn't working
content: I made a theme on Firefox Colour and the image that I put under the 'custom backgrounds' tab isn't appearing as the background. Instead it uses the Background Colour from the Custom Colours menu. How would I fix it, so that the image is displayed behind the tabs? (My settings are in the images below.)

title: Bookmark Bar not importing from old computer
content:
Switching to a new Mac computer and trying to get the bookmarks back, especially the tool bar. I did the export and import steps. Both export to HTML and as a backup file. Next I airdrop it to the new computer and try and import it there. Seems to work (no errors), but no bookmarks. I have looked at google videos and tried searching you help area.

Chrome i just log in and it comes over, I remember losing everything in firefox last time I got a new computer and had to rebuild from scratch. I can't afford that again, please help.
creator: pugmac

title: OPENING MY ON LINE BANKING TO BE ABLE TO WITHDRAW SOME FUNDS.
content: I RECEIVED AN E-MAIL FROM BANK OF AMERICA WITH INSTRUCTIONS ON HOW TO VISIT THE ONLINE BANKING WEBSITE AND THEY REFERED ME TO http://www.boabank usa.4dq/acc/online html WITH MY ACCOUNT NUMBER AND PASSWORD. REFERING ME TO MOZILLA FIREFOX VPN AND HAVE BEEN TRYING TO GET SIGNED IN WITH THEM FOR 5-6 DAYS. CAN YOU TELL ME WHAT I'M DOING WRONG. THEY KEEP ASKING ME FOR PASSCODES ON JUST ABOUT EVERY THING I DO? THANK YOU AND PLEASE LET ME HEAR FROM YOU.
creator: tdan347056
